description: Does not update any more due to Nomics API key issues. Used to work fine in the past.

On Kubuntu 20.04 with dark theme and K10 (Windows-like) window decorations it looks awful.
Everything is white, including the titlebar and my window decorations are not there, but instead it show Gnome like buttons all over the titlebar.
Looking at the picture I thought that at least it has a dark theme, but it doesn't or it doesn't work on KDE.
Also I tried to change the displayed currency to Euro, but it's not possible, there's no such config option.
Uninstalled it unfortunately.
Great "At a glance" chart views for Crypto. Real handy and I have not any trouble with the app!
I run a gnome environment, so integration wasn't an issue for me. The program looks and functions exactly how I'd expect from the pictures
Pretty good app, simple and beautiful, hope EUR currency could be available for the next release. Good job.
Fonctionne très bien, mais manque cruellement de FIAT diverses !
